name: COMMUNITY COLLEGE OF PHILADELPHIA Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, and Faculty Federation of the Community College of Philadelphia
name_abbreviation: Community College of Philadelphia v. Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMUNITY COLLEGE OF PHILADELPHIA Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, and Faculty Federation of the Community College of Philadelphia.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order of Commonwealth Court affirmed.
60 Pa.Cmwlth. 629,432 A.2d 637.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Howard R. Flaxman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Michael Brodie, Philadelphia, for Faculty Federation.
James L. Crawford, Anthony C. Busillo, II, Asst. Attys. Gen., for Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 942
COMMUNITY COLLEGE OF PHILADELPHIA Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA LABOR RELATIONS BOARD, and Faculty Federation of the Community College of Philadelphia.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 26, 1981.
Decided Dec. 17, 1981.
Howard R. Flaxman, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Michael Brodie, Philadelphia, for Faculty Federation.
James L. Crawford, Anthony C. Busillo, II, Asst. Attys. Gen., for Pennsylvania Labor Relations Board.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
